product.name: No Tools No Drill Cordless Mini Blinds, 100% Privacy L-Shaped Blades 1" Vinyl Blinds for Indoor Windows, for Windows Size (20" W × 36" H) Color (White)
product.description: Blinds that can be installed without drilling holes, with L-shaped blades for better privacy and blocking pipes, great for toilets, bathrooms, bedrooms.
product.bullet_points:
• 1【How to choose the correct size of blinds】How to choose the width: Please choose the actual width of the window, the actual width of the blinds will be reduced by 3/8 inch to fit the window. HOW TO SELECT HEIGHT: Please select a size ≥ the actual height of the window (NOTE: Shutters can only be installed internally, not externally, as the ends need to be stressed to allow for a no-drill installation).
• 2【NO TOOLS NON-DRILLING】The shutter adopts special mounting fittings, which makes it easy to install without drilling, and also avoids damaging the wall.
• 3【L-Shaped Blade/100% Privacy/100% ANTI-PEEP】Blinds are designed with unique L-shaped blade, which enhances the blackout performance and effectively prevents light from penetrating through the gaps between the blades, and the L-shaped blade closes tightly when closed, Improvement the blackout effect and creates a more comfortable and private space. Whether you are taking a lunch break during the day or resting at night, the darkness and privacy of the room can be fully guaranteed.
• 4【Vinyl Blade Material】 Select vinyl as the blade material, vinyl blade has toughness, not easy to bend and deform and smooth surface, easy to clean and take care of, just gently wipe can be restored as new, improve the service life of the curtains and the convenience of daily maintenance.
• 5【Cordless System】The blinds adopt a cordless manual push-pull operating system, saying goodbye to the safety hazards caused by electric cords. It can effectively prevent accidents caused by tangled cords and ensure the safety of your family and pets. Meanwhile, it can easily achieve a precise stay at any position, allowing you to adjust the light as you wish.
features: 1【How to choose the correct size of blinds】How to choose the width: Please choose the actual width of the window, the actual width of the blinds will be reduced by 3/8 inch to fit the window. HOW TO SELECT HEIGHT: Please select a size ≥ the actual height of the window (NOTE: Shutters can only be installed internally, not externally, as the ends need to be stressed to allow for a no-drill installation).
2【NO TOOLS NON-DRILLING】The shutter adopts special mounting fittings, which makes it easy to install without drilling, and also avoids damaging the wall.

3【L-Shaped Blade/100% Privacy/100% ANTI-PEEP】Blinds are designed with unique L-shaped blade, which enhances the blackout performance and effectively prevents light from penetrating through the gaps between the blades, and the L-shaped blade closes tightly when closed, Improvement the blackout effect and creates a more comfortable and private space. Whether you are taking a lunch break during the day or resting at night, the darkness and privacy of the room can be fully guaranteed.

4【Vinyl Blade Material】 Select vinyl as the blade material, vinyl blade has toughness, not easy to bend and deform and smooth surface, easy to clean and take care of, just gently wipe can be restored as new, improve the service life of the curtains and the convenience of daily maintenance.

5【Cordless System】The blinds adopt a cordless manual push-pull operating system, saying goodbye to the safety hazards caused by electric cords. It can effectively prevent accidents caused by tangled cords and ensure the safety of your family and pets. Meanwhile, it can easily achieve a precise stay at any position, allowing you to adjust the light as you wish.

specifications.room_type: Garage, Bathroom, Bedroom, Home Office, Media Room
specifications.special_feature: No drilling or damage to walls, Enhanced indoor privacy protection, Shade from sunlight and control of light
specifications.customer_reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 137 ratings 4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.best_sellers_rank: #39,527 in Home & Kitchen (See Top 100 in Home & Kitchen) #32 in Horizontal Window Blinds
specifications.product_care_instructions: Cleaning and maintaining blinds is not complicated. For daily cleaning, you can use a vacuum cleaner or microfiber cloth to remove dust. For deeper cleaning, remove the curtains and wipe them with warm water and neutral detergent, then rinse with water and air dry. Check cords and fittings regularly to avoid moisture and keep curtains dry. Clean them once a week and deep clean them every few months. This will keep your blinds clean and durable.
